room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: We booked the Zombie Apocalypse room for my father's 65th Birthday and it was perfect! We had a blast even though we didn't make it out. Our host Leo, was extremely helpful throughout our escape. We definitely will be booking a different room on our next visit.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: There were 6 of us that went and we did the Zombie Apocalypse room. We had a blast! It was hard but we escaped with only 14 mins to spare! Gabi was a great hostess and we are looking forward to coming back to Houston Panic Room to check the other rooms out.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: We had so much fun in the Zombie room. We escaped with 9 and a half minutes left. We are definitely going back for more.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: What a great time! We did the zombie room. The clues were very clever and hard. The staff is really nice and helpful. Will definitely go back and do another room!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Apocalypse" by Houston Panic Room in Houston
review: So much fun! Put your thinking caps on and think out loud. Leila was great having to put up with our rowdy group. Will definitely return to try out the other rooms - - But for now we survived the Zombies.
